definitions.definition: At all times; throughout all time; since the beginning.
examples: Green has always been my favorite color. I’ve loved it for as long as I can remember.
Airplanes did not always exist as a form of transportation.

definitions.definition: Constantly during a certain period, or regularly at stated intervals (opposed to sometimes or occasionally ).
examples: In this street, the shops always close during lunchtime.

definitions.definition: if necessary, or if there is no better option; in any event .
examples: I thought I could always go back to work.

main_definition: At all times; throughout all time; since the beginning.
secondary_definitions: Constantly during a certain period, or regularly at stated intervals (opposed to sometimes or occasionally ).
( informal ) if necessary, or if there is no better option; in any event .
